MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CanMove As Boolean
public: property bool CanMove { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指定是否可以移动 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 元素。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element can be moved.

value.span: 如果可以移动该元素，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the element can be moved; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能移动、 调整大小或旋转，以便其生成的屏幕位置将完全位于坐标其容器的和键盘或鼠标无法访问外部对象。An object cannot be moved, resized or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 例如，当顶层窗口移动完全屏幕或子对象移动的容器的视区边界之外。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在这些情况下该对象被放在尽可能靠近尽可能与顶部或左侧坐标被覆盖以位于容器边界内的请求的屏幕坐标。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 在以下示例中，控件模式的均来自和随后用于移动。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and subsequently used to move the . [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#103)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CanResize As Boolean
public: property bool CanResize { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素是否可以调整大小。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element can be resized.

value.span: 如果元素可以调整大小，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the element can be resized; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能移动、 调整大小或旋转，以便其生成的屏幕位置将完全位于坐标其容器的和键盘或鼠标无法访问外部对象。An object cannot be moved, resized, or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 例如，当顶层窗口移动完全屏幕或子对象移动的容器的视区边界之外。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在这些情况下该对象被放在尽可能靠近尽可能与顶部或左侧坐标被覆盖以位于容器边界内的请求的屏幕坐标。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 在以下示例中，控件模式的均来自随后用于调整大小和。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and subsequently used to resize the . [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#104)]
